translations: n.[医]高压灭菌法；高压蒸气养护
v.用高压锅烹饪；用高压灭菌器消毒（autoclave 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 高压蒸气养护, 高压灭菌法, 高压灭菌, 高压

sentences.sentence: Sterilization of biopsy forceps by autoclaving accounted for only 17.4%.
sentences.translation: 用压力蒸汽灭菌法对活检钳进行灭菌处理者仅占17.4%。

sentences.sentence: Sterilization of biopsy forceps by autoclaving or cyclo-ethane take up 26.78%.
sentences.translation: 活检钳采用压力蒸汽与环氧乙烷灭菌26.78%。

sentences.sentence: Results: Autoclaving could fulfil the requirement of sterilization of stomatologic instruments.
sentences.translation: 结果，压力蒸汽灭菌处理可使口腔医疗器械达到灭菌要求。
